26#include "config.h"
27#include "NetworkCacheFileSystem.h"
28
29#include "Logging.h"
30#include <wtf/Assertions.h>
31#include <wtf/FileSystem.h>
32#include <wtf/Function.h>
33#include <wtf/text/CString.h>
34
35#if !OS(WINDOWS)
36#include <dirent.h>
37#include <sys/stat.h>
38#include <sys/time.h>
39#else
40#include <windows.h>
41#endif
42
43#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY) && !PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY_SIMULATOR)
44#include <sys/attr.h>
45#include <unistd.h>
46#endif
47
48#if USE(SOUP)
49#include <gio/gio.h>
50#include <wtf/glib/GRefPtr.h>
51#endif
52
53namespace WebKit {
54namespace NetworkCache {
55
56void traverseDirectory(const String& path, const Function<void (const String&, DirectoryEntryType)>& function)
57{
58 auto entries = FileSystem::listDirectory(path);
59 for (auto& entry : entries) {
60 auto entryPath = FileSystem::pathByAppendingComponent(path, entry);
61 auto type = FileSystem::fileType(entryPath) == FileSystem::FileType::Directory ? DirectoryEntryType::Directory : DirectoryEntryType::File;
62 function(entry, type);
63 }
64}
65
66FileTimes fileTimes(const String& path)
67{
68#if HAVE(STAT_BIRTHTIME)
69 struct stat fileInfo;
70 if (stat(FileSystem::fileSystemRepresentation(path).data(), &fileInfo))
71 return { };
72 return { WallTime::fromRawSeconds(fileInfo.st_birthtime), WallTime::fromRawSeconds(fileInfo.st_mtime) };
73#elif USE(SOUP)
74 // There's no st_birthtime in some operating systems like Linux, so we use xattrs to set/get the creation time.
75 GRefPtr<GFile> file = adoptGRef(g_file_new_for_path(FileSystem::fileSystemRepresentation(path).data()));
76 GRefPtr<GFileInfo> fileInfo = adoptGRef(g_file_query_info(file.get(), "xattr::birthtime,time::modified", G_FILE_QUERY_INFO_NONE, nullptr, nullptr));
77 if (!fileInfo)
78 return { };
79 const char* birthtimeString = g_file_info_get_attribute_string(fileInfo.get(), "xattr::birthtime");
80 if (!birthtimeString)
81 return { };
82 return { WallTime::fromRawSeconds(g_ascii_strtoull(birthtimeString, nullptr, 10)),
83 WallTime::fromRawSeconds(g_file_info_get_attribute_uint64(fileInfo.get(), "time::modified")) };
84#elif OS(WINDOWS)
85 auto createTime = FileSystem::fileCreationTime(path);
86 auto modifyTime = FileSystem::fileModificationTime(path);
87 return { createTime.value_or(WallTime()), modifyTime.value_or(WallTime()) };
88#endif
89}
90
91void updateFileModificationTimeIfNeeded(const String& path)
92{
93 auto times = fileTimes(path);
94 if (times.creation != times.modification) {
95 // Don't update more than once per hour.
96 if (WallTime::now() - times.modification < 1_h)
97 return;
98 }
99 FileSystem::updateFileModificationTime(path);
100}
101
102}
103}
